task: Develop a basic 'Kid Icarus' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Give way to your worst impulse'.
name: Icarus Unleashed

branding_data.short_description: Embark on a chaotic journey with Icarus, where impulsive decisions lead to unpredictable outcomes.
branding_data.detailed_description: Icarus Unleashed is a reimagined take on the classic 'Kid Icarus' game, infused with the chaos of unrestrained impulses. Players control Icarus as he navigates through treacherous landscapes filled with mythical creatures and challenging obstacles. The twist in this adventure is the incorporation of the oblique strategy 'Give way to your worst impulse,' where players must make impulsive choices that drastically alter the game's progression and outcomes. These choices can lead to unexpected paths, creating a unique experience each time you play. With vibrant graphics and a dynamic soundtrack, Icarus Unleashed challenges players to embrace chaos and explore the consequences of their most reckless decisions.

strategy: Give way to your worst impulse
